buildCommand: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

headers.value: default-src 'self' data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.socket.io https://unpkg.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; connect-src 'self' https: wss: ws: data: blob: https://video-translate-backend-wv9b.onrender.com wss://video-translate-backend-wv9b.onrender.com https://api.libretranslate.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:; img-src 'self' data: blob: https:; media-src 'self' data: blob: https: mediastream:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-src 'self'; worker-src 'self' blob:;
